short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Query enables cybersecurity teams to run federated searches on their data, wherever it is stored.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simplify the way you search security data. This Chrome extension lets cybersecurity teams run federated searches with inputs from any web console or page.

* Vastly increase visibility across your enterprise
Query lets you quickly access data from all sources with a single search, including non-security data sources and unstructured data in cloud storage, returning easy-to-understand results that drastically improve the speed and quality of your security investigations.

* Add new data sources in minutes
Query can easily add data sources via API in a matter of minutes versus hours, days or weeks.

* Context-rich visual interface
Query provides results fully normalized and in a single, graphical view to enhance operator understanding.

* Add data sources without incremental data costs
Add more data sources without increasing your cost and reduce cost by storing data where you want. No more compromising on security data for operators due to expense!

* Reduce Analyst Workload
By allowing security analysts to quickly and easily search and understand data from all sources, Query reduces the number of tasks per investigation, resulting in 5-10x more efficient investigations.

* Improve Proactive Security
Enabling vastly greater visibility into security-relevant data sources that often get missed, Query allows your security teams to be proactive in hunting cyber threats like never before.

* Decouple Data Value from Data Cost
Query Federated Search letâ€™s security teams see into more data sources more quickly, regardless of storage location - putting your data to work for security investigations without spending on costly centralization efforts. You choose where to keep your data, we make it easy (and cheap) to use.

* For setup assistance, please reach contact@query.ai
* For additional information please visit https://www.query.ai
